column2: 1. Manage 3rd party Service Providers for Technical Service      2. Resource planning      3. Track & ensure timely corrective action on service related KPIs(TAT, PM/QA Execution)      4. Provide Back Office support for Automation Tools      5. Drive Machine Refurbishment      6. Drive Training programs for Caf Care Engineers

Monitoring overall    Currency Chest Operations as per the   regulatory guidelines Liasoning with the RBI-Department of   Currency Management-Central office for support required at local issue   office. Coordination with the    Internal -Department for support. Setting up the quarterly CBL within the   assigned limit by RBI, also ensure each chest maintain the balance within the   limit Setting up Branch CRL in coordination   with BIU & Circle BBO . Dissenting the RBI instruction to the   Currency Chest for conducting the chest operations within the compliance  Visit to Currency chest- Annual &   FNVC visit on periodic intervals  Running through Governance template for   checking real time status of various parameters as mentioned in the checklist    Tracking conduct of the audits on timely   basis as defined by regulator and checking availability of closure report Set-up/ Relocation of Currency chest-   Coordinating with Circle BBO and CRES right from site selection to   inauguration and operationalization of chest Expense management- Setting up a yearly   budged and ensure that the expenses are within the allocated budget. Establishment of Forged note vigilance   cell at CO and adhering to its functions across the Currency Chest Hiring and SLA execution with Sorting and   CIT agencies Automation of Currency Chest processes Updation of Currency Chest manual on   regular interval  Representing bank in SLSC/SCCM meetings   of RBI issue offices across bank and submission of the reply on the banks   actionable Take appropriate measures to mitigate the   risk identified in RCSA to improve the EGRC rank. Conducting RCA if any lapses found Yearly assessment (PMS) of the Currency   Chest staff Provide necessary inputs and material to   Training Team for effective training for Branch teller/ CC staff and avoiding   any regulatory penalty. Mentor and coach team members to progress   within system by following the Banks Core Values and professionalism.  Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile     Liasoning with RBI / Circle office /Other Bank/ Branches /Central office Monitoring of Currency Chest Operations as per the regulatory guidelines   Follow the regulatory guidelines ( RBI/ Safety security/Internal)   Automation of Currency Chest Process   Monitoring of Currency Chest CBL & Branch CRL  Dissenting the RBI instruction to the Currency Chest  Execution of SLA  Guidance    to Currency Chest.
column11: Currency Chest, Currency, Regulatory Guidelines, Cash Handling, RBI Guidelines, RBI, Bank Operation, Cash Management, cash processing centre

column2: Dear Candidates, Greetings from Black and White Business Solutions To apply contact below  HR Danuja @ 080647432418\9513292932 Email ID: danuja@blackwhite.in Designation: Manager Experience: 10-20 years of exp Job Location: Bengaluru Qualifications: Any Graduation Roles and Responsibilities  Process all assigned tasks for retirement plan administration (401k US pension funds)         which typically includes indicative, participant enrollment into various 401k plans        contributions, Payroll processing loan repayments/payoff/issue,       fund/investment addition, quality check, reversal of any financial transactions posted. The        money received can be in the form of checks, ACH, or Wire with       instructions attached.  Handling US based stakeholders including escalations mails and queries.  Post trade settlements, makes sure the money received through Checks Ach and        Wire are in proportionate with the money deposited into accounts. quarterly, monthly         financial statement generation analysis and reconciliation.  Consistently met or exceeded target goals for SLA parameters of TAT, productivity quality,   etc.  Investments/Funds Addition, deletion, changes to investment funds through        various scripts and transaction.  Verification of Legal documents, determining the beneficiary in case of death and sending the payment through checks Ach or Wire.  Working on SOP and procedure updates as per new updates Skills Required  401k retirement plan  401k rollovers  Company reconciliation  Financial statement& Analysis  Defined contribution / Defined Benefit  Client Query Satisfaction  Travel and Expenses Management  Beneficiary Determination  Trade settlements  Account reconciliation  Capital Market  Asset management.   --  Thanks & Regards, Danuja HR Analyst- TA-Delivery Black and White Business Solutions Pvt Ltd Bangalore,Karnataka,INDIA. Direct Number: 8067432418| danuja@blackwhite.in | www.blackwhite.in
column11: Retirement Planning, Benefits Administration, Defined Contribution, 401K, Pension Administration, Defined Benefits, Transaction Processing
